rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with minimalistic Scandinavian design elements.
Spacious living area featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light and an open feel.
An integrated dining space adjacent to the living room for a cohesive flow.
Functional kitchen with open plan design and Scandinavian aesthetics.
A dedicated library space designed for quiet reading and study.
Compact but functional washroom with efficient storage solutions.

openings.description: Main entrance with glass panels to enhance natural light and connection.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with ample natural light and minimalistic decor.
Secondary bedroom offering privacy and comfort.
Functional bathroom designed for utility and ease of maintenance.

openings.description: Balcony access providing a view and fresh air.

building_dimensions.orientation: North facing to enhance natural light and comply with Vastu principles

budget_note: Design optimized for a tight budget by focusing on multipurpose spaces and cost-effective Scandinavian design elements.
